themes.name: AI Infrastructure Buildout
themes.description: Enterprise and cloud providers accelerating AI infrastructure investments; semiconductor, data center, and AI software companies benefiting from sustained capital allocation.

themes.name: Energy Transition and Sustainability
themes.description: Increased focus on renewable energy sources and sustainable practices; companies involved in clean energy, battery technology, and carbon capture are likely to see growth.

themes.name: Value Over Growth Rotation
themes.description: Market sentiment shifting towards value stocks as investors seek stability and dividends amid economic uncertainty; sectors like financials, consumer staples, and energy may outperform.

themes.name: Health and Biotech Innovation
themes.description: Continued advancements in healthcare technology and biotech; companies focused on telehealth, personalized medicine, and innovative therapies are positioned for growth.

themes.name: Infrastructure Spending Surge
themes.description: Government initiatives and funding aimed at modernizing infrastructure; construction, materials, and engineering firms are likely to benefit from increased public and private investment.

themes.name: Demographic Shifts and Aging Population
themes.description: Growing demand for healthcare services and products driven by an aging population; companies in senior care, pharmaceuticals, and healthcare technology are expected to thrive.

themes.name: Geopolitical Tensions and Supply Chain Resilience
themes.description: Increased focus on supply chain resilience and domestic manufacturing due to geopolitical tensions; companies investing in local production and logistics are likely to gain an edge.

themes.name: Consumer Behavior Shifts Post-Pandemic
themes.description: Changes in consumer preferences towards e-commerce, sustainability, and health-conscious products; companies adapting to these trends are expected to perform well.
